title: Orchestral Fantasy Music Pack
description: Orchestral Fantasy Music Pack is an album with 5 orchestral fantasy tracks featuring realistic orchestra, cinematic percussions and choir with Hollywood quality.
longDescription:
4 FREE BONUS TRACKS INCLUDED!! (More information below)


Orchestral Fantasy Music Pack is an album with 5 orchestral fantasy tracks featuring realistic orchestra, cinematic percussions and choir with Hollywood quality. It contains magical and captivating melodies, fantastic and very strong harmonies and dreamy backgrounds. You can find dramatic, emotive parts and also even chasing feel parts. These tracks are perfect for any kind of situation and they are easy to embed into your game or media production.


The pack contains 5 full versions + full looped version of each track. In addition, the pack includes 4 fantasy bonus tracks (2 full versions + 2 looped versions) that you can use for your scenes for free.


You can preview the full versions here:


https://soundcloud.com/ficus-prosound/sets/orchestral-fantasy-music-pack:


For any question, request or custom music you can contact me at: hello@jordilongan.com
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • High quality original music
  • Full and looped versions
  • 4 Bonus Free Tracks
  • Responsive support

Number of Audio Wavs: 14

Number of Audio Cues: 14

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 22:27

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/ficus-prosound/sets/orchestral-fantasy-music-pack
